extracted_entities.name: Postdoctoral position in Computer Science, OPEHRA

qualifications: PhD in Computer Science or a closely related subject
PhD should be completed within three years before the application deadline
assessment_criteria: Experience in impact and risk assessments related to digital health systems
Familiarity with European legal frameworks (AI Act, GDPR, Human Rights law)
details.duty: Conduct research in AI-based systems for digital health, develop AI literacy materials, and contribute to teaching activities (up to 20% of working time)
